articles.title: America’s only rare earth producer gets a boost from Apple and Pentagon agreements - AP News
articles.description: MP Materials, the operator of the only rare earths mine in the United States, has signed a $500 million deal with Apple. The agreement announced Tuesday aims to boost production of magnets used in iPhones, as well as other high tech products like electric veh…
articles.content: MP Materials, which runs the only American rare earths mine, announced a new $500 million agreement with tech giant Apple on Tuesday to produce more of the powerful magnets used in iPhones as well as… [+3976 chars]
